description: Crafted in Italy, the Purple Label Polo shirt is the ultimate in casual luxury. Its lightweight fabric is knit from premium cotton and double-mercerized to enhance its strength and color retention. "Ralph Lauren"-debossed buttons made from genuine mother-of-pearl and our stacked logo complete this modern icon.
fitting_details: Custom Slim Fit: cut slightly slim.
Size medium has a 29" body length (front and back), a 17.5" shoulder, and a 41" chest.
Ribbed Polo collar. Three-button placket. Genuine mother-of-pearl buttons.
Short sleeves with ribbed armbands. "Ralph Lauren" script embroidered at the right sleeve.
Stacked "RL" logo embroidered at the left chest.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
product: Custom Slim Fit Piqué Polo Shirt
